Text:
Please seed for as long as you possible can.  Also, beware of FAKE and other CANIBALIZED versions of this masterpiece! I'd like to point out a rather blatant attempt to include some Polsih garbage music under the guise of Balkanika and Balkan Koncept.  One of them is right here:  http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4406058/Balkanika_-_Balkan_Concept_(2008)_[mp3_VBR]_[PL]

So, please, enjoy this extraordinary Balkan presentation conceived and produced by Sanja Ilic, not some Polish fuck!  And don't forget to seed!
